auth_token.description: Netdata Cloud Authentication Token with `scope:all`, more [info](https://learn.netdata.cloud/docs/netdata-cloud/api-tokens). Can be also set as environment variable `NETDATA_CLOUD_AUTH_TOKEN`

url.description: Netdata Cloud URL Address by default is https://app.netdata.cloud. Can be also set as environment variable `NETDATA_CLOUD_URL`

block.description: The Netdata Provider allows you to manage Netdata Cloud resources.

node_names.description: List of node names to add to the room. At least one node name is required.

room_id.description: The Room ID of the space.

action.description: Determines whether matching nodes will be included or excluded from the room. Valid values: INCLUDE or EXCLUDE. EXCLUDE action always takes precedence against INCLUDE.

operator.description: Operator to compare. Valid values: equals, starts_with, ends_with, contains.

block.description: The clause to apply to the rule. The logical relation between multiple clauses is AND. It should be a least one clause.

The node rule to apply to the room. The logical relation between multiple rules is OR. More info [here](https://learn.netdata.cloud/docs/netdata-cloud/spaces-and-rooms/node-rule-based-room-assignment).

Provides a Netdata Cloud Node Room Member resource. Use this resource to manage node membership to the room in the selected space.
There are two options to add nodes to the room:
- providing the node names directly, but only reachable nodes will be added to the room, use node_names attribute for this
- creating rules that will automatically add nodes to the room based on the rule, use rule block for this

channel_thread.description: Discord channel thread name required if channel type is `forum`

channel_type.description: Discord channel type. Valid values are: `text`, `forum`

enabled.description: The enabled status of the Discord notification

id.description: The ID of the Discord notification

name.description: The name of the Discord notification

notifications.description: The notification options for the Discord. Valid values are: `CRITICAL`, `WARNING`, `CLEAR`, `REACHABLE`, `UNREACHABLE`

repeat_notification_min.description: The time interval for the Discord notification to be repeated. The interval is presented in minutes and should be between 30 and 1440, or 0 to avoid repetition, which is the default.

rooms_id.description: The list of room IDs to set the Discord notification. If the rooms list is null, the Discord notification will be applied to `All rooms`

space_id.description: The ID of the space for the Discord notification

block.description: Resource for managing centralized notifications for Discord. Available only in paid plans.

enabled.description: The enabled status of the Pagerduty notification

id.description: The ID of the Pagerduty notification

name.description: The name of the Pagerduty notification

notifications.description: The notification options for the Pagerduty. Valid values are: `CRITICAL`, `WARNING`, `CLEAR`, `REACHABLE`, `UNREACHABLE`

repeat_notification_min.description: The time interval for the Pagerduty notification to be repeated. The interval is presented in minutes and should be between 30 and 1440, or 0 to avoid repetition, which is the default.

rooms_id.description: The list of room IDs to set the Pagerduty notification. If the rooms list is null, the Pagerduty notification will be applied to `All rooms`

space_id.description: The ID of the space for the Pagerduty notification

block.description: Resource for managing centralized notifications for Pagerduty. Available only in paid plans.

enabled.description: The enabled status of the Slack notification

id.description: The ID of the Slack notification

name.description: The name of the Slack notification

notifications.description: The notification options for the Slack. Valid values are: `CRITICAL`, `WARNING`, `CLEAR`, `REACHABLE`, `UNREACHABLE`

repeat_notification_min.description: The time interval for the Slack notification to be repeated. The interval is presented in minutes and should be between 30 and 1440, or 0 to avoid repetition, which is the default.

rooms_id.description: The list of room IDs to set the Slack notification. If the rooms list is null, the Slack notification will be applied to `All rooms`

space_id.description: The ID of the space for the Slack notification

block.description: Resource for managing centralized notifications for Slack. Available only in paid plans.
Provides a Netdata Cloud Room resource. Use this resource to manage rooms in the selected space.

room_id.description: The Room ID of the space

space_member_id.description: The Space Member ID of the space

block.description: Provides a Netdata Cloud Room Member resource. Use this resource to manage user membership to the room in the selected space. It is referring to the user created at the space level.

claim_token.description: The claim token of the space

block.description: Provides a Netdata Cloud Space resource. Use this resource to manage spaces.

id.description: The Member ID of the space

role.description: Role of the member. The community plan can only set the role to `admin`

block.description: Provides a Netdata Cloud Space Member resource. Use this resource to manage user membership to the space.
Use this data source to get information about a Netdata Cloud Room.

claim_token.description: The claim token of the space

block.description: Use this data source to get information about a Netdata Cloud Space.
